author: gmazza
msg: Dependencies updated to the latest except for Struts, which is incurring some JSP compilation error over the style attribute within Struts tags when trying to upgrade from Struts 2.3.16 to 2.3.20.  mvn jetty:run is working again (run from the app folder as usual).

msg: * src/experimental/mod_rivet.c: handling separate_channels flag for virtual host
* configure.ac: apache utils configuration split from APR configuration
* Makefile.am: new symbols APU_INCLUDES and APU_LDFLAGS

author: daijy
msg: PIG-4370: HBaseStorage should support delete markers

msg: * src/apache-2/mod_rivet.c: handling separate_channel flag to create virtual host specific
